sources.title: The Return of Captain Nemo
sources.description: Jose Ferrerr, Burgess Meredith, Mel Ferrer

metadata.Plot: Two US Navy divers discover the Nautilus trapped underwater, with Captain Nemo in suspended animation inside for the last century. Once Nemo is revived, the government makes a deal with him to refit his ship with a few modern technologies in exchange for his helping to defeat Professor Cunningham, a mad genius threatening to destroy Washington with a missile from his own submarine unless he is paid a billion dollars. Later, Nemo continues and completes his search for the sunken city of Atlantis, delayed 100 years by his long time in stasis.
metadata.Writer: Larry Alexander, Irwin Allen, Robert Bloch
metadata.Actors: Jos√© Ferrer, Burgess Meredith, Tom Hallick
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 1 nomination total
